name: Spoonful - Issue 9
description:
The **SWEETNESS*** issue is here, finally! Hooray! Yippeee! What took you so long?!!!

Created with guest-designer Ellie Nuss, this issue finds the gentle sweetness in everyday moments. With delicious giggly writing, wondrous multi-tiered cakes and scrumptious crafty ideas you'll need a large cup of hot tea and a comfy chair to sink into & have a good read!

thea.
xx

name: Spoonful - Issue 8
description:
Our long-awaited flower issue is finally in bloom!

With vintage blossoms, bursting bouquets and a whimsy-filled craft tutorial by the wondrous Alina Bunaciu... it's an issue a few pages longer than previous ones, and so much more packed with life for it ;)

Even our happiness list has been created by people who work with flowers.... 

may it bring a beautiful flower-filled Spring to the centre of your world ;)

thea.
xx

name: Spoonful - Issue 7
description:
with a puff, a ping and a swoosh, * . * . * . *
Issue 7 embraces the magical possibilities of life with its literally spell-binding-inspired contents :)

Filled with the imaginative prowess of photographic artist, Joel Robison, the whimsical cross-stitchery of Eline Pellinkhof, delicious typography by Jen Reninger, and of course, our year's inspiration & Object of affection - THE DRAGON, you will find wonders in the little things.

We hope, with issue 7, that you'll marvel at the wonder that is the mind, re-see that sparkle of light through the window, and begin to believe that this life, could, in fact...
be magic.

name: Spoonful - Issue 6
description:
This issue, we've called on Mother Nature as our Inspiration!!!

Fill your skies & home with the shimmer of the hummingbird's wings (as they hover in our Objects of affection section) Bake fresh warm Hummingbird layer cake (YES!!! We have a recipe made just for us by KatrinaM!) and craft some Kindness with the magical Annet de Vries...

This issue gives care to those we love and believes in a renaissance of wonder!
Fill Christmas Stockings, New Year's Resolutions and the post Xmas slumps with golden pages and soulful words...

Very excited to share this issue with you lovelies!!

thea & the Spoonful team.
Xx

*NOTE Our first 15 subscribers & 5 buyers win a limited edition Kareena Zerefos Hummingbird Print - Sigh, isn't it pretty??!

*Note: DELIVERIES to go out from December 19th 2011!!

*Note II: Prices in $US to allow for international happiness. (don't worry aussies, it's about 30c difference :)

name: Spoonful - Issue 5
description:
This Issue is all about the beauty of the moment & adding a little sparkle into our everyday lives.

We're hoping it will give you the courage you need to make the big decisions & the tools required to enrich your life and see it as the gorgeous thing that it is! Gosh we do sound sure of ourselves don't we? But honestly, how could we not? The writers and artists who have taken part to create issue 5 will bring soulful happy tears to your eyes - at least, they did ours.

We can't wait to hear what you lovely readers think of it all...

thea & the Spoonful team.
Xx


*Note: Prices in $US to allow for international happiness. (don't worry aussies, it's about 30c difference :)

name: Spoonful - Issue 1
description:
DUE TO A HIGH DEMAND, we have just reprinted a limited edition print run of Spoonfuls, Issue 01. If you don't have your own, get in quick, they seem to sell out fast!

Well, this is our very first issue, and therefore infused with all the beauty, collaboration & enthusiasm that comes with a new beginning...

Packed with an overwhelming selection of ways to inspire, feel contentment and recover from failures, Spoonful 01 is guaranteed to make a highly satisfying & soulful little gift, perfect for yourself, friends, family, Birthdays, & that general everyday business of just being alive.

Spoonful is printed on quality 100% recycled stock & in limited edition print runs.

name: Spoonful - Issue 2
description:
A little juicier and with a few more pages, (including our shiny new craft section - we heart dottie angel!) Spoonful 2 embraces the spirit of creativity & how it allows for internal happiness.  

Packed still, with an overwhelming selection of ways to inspire, feel contentment and recover from failures, Spoonful 02 is guaranteed to make a highly satisfying & soulful little gift, perfect for yourself, friends, family, birthdays, & that general everyday business of just being alive.

With more images by the amazing Isadora Pestana, and hilarious failure musings by the award-winning playwright, Rachel Musgrove, we know Issue 2 shall not disappoint!

Spoonful is printed on quality 100% recycled stock & in limited edition print runs.

name: Spoonful - Issue 3
description:
This issue has been created with an amazing batch of talented & deliciously inspiring creatives who we just know will inspire you to see life afresh, to live it with new eyes, new hope and a few chuckles of contentment along the way :)

Continuing our spirit of embracing creativity, this issue features the delicate and beautiful 'tinyhappy' as our Crafter, the hilarious Michael Lewis as the writer of our 'Spilt Milk' piece, and an array of fabulous artists interpreting our happiness object - the beautiful old galleon!

Spoonful 03 is guaranteed to make a highly satisfying & soulful little gift, perfect for yourself, friends, family, birthdays, & that general everyday business of just being alive.

Let us know what you think, won't you? We want to grow with each issue, to fulfill little soulful wishes and open those little doors to happiness which are sitting quietly inside each one of us.

Spoonful is printed on quality 100% recycled stock & in limited edition print runs.


*Note: Prices in $US to allow for international happiness. (don't worry aussies, it's about 20c difference :)

name: Spoonful - Issue 4
description:
Well! Issue 4 is our current favourite (but then the newest one always is so that's cheating isn't it?) 

Suffice to say we don't think you'll be disappointed with the scrumptious flying elephants in our Objects of Affection section... a wondrous illustration by Eva Juliet... words & photography exploring the magical wonders of a cup of tea... and crafty sparkliness by Denise Sharp of StudioDSharp... and well more - more in our bite-sized little companion of happiness.

May this issue cross fields and sky, 
reach hearts and homes, 
& cheer the saddest and happiest of souls...

the Spoonful team.
xx 

Spoonful is printed on quality 100% recycled stock & in limited edition print runs.


*Note: Prices in $US to allow for international happiness. (don't worry aussies, it's about 30c difference :)

name: Back Issues - A whole bunch!
description:
Missed out on some past issues but want them as a set of Spoonfuls for your bookcase/inspiration/reading leisure? 
Why not buy a set of 4 back issues?

You will receive the last 4 consecutive spoonfuls, or any combination of back issues of your choosing. 

Please specify in your purchase notes which issues you would like, otherwise, we will just send the latest issues :)  


*If you're a bit unsure, just email us at spoonfulzine.com and we shall come to the rescue!

**Note: Prices in $US to allow for international happiness. (don't worry aussies, it's about 30c difference :)
